content:
IServiceRemotingRequestContext IServiceRemotingRequestContext Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

Defines the interface that must be implemented to provide the request context for the IServiceRemotingMessageHandler.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IServiceRemotingRequestContextPublic Interface IServiceRemotingRequestContext

Methods

GetCallbackClient() GetCallbackClient()

Edit

Gets the client channel interface to use in cases where service wants to initiate calls to the client.

Returns

Remoting callback client
